name: Bass Fillets Baked With Ginger and Sesame Oil
keywords: bass, ginger root, dairy-free, gluten-free, nut-free, vegetarian, main course
recipeIngredient: 4 bass fillets (about 4 ounces each), all bones removed
4 small cloves garlic, peeled and minced

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Divide the fillets between 2 large sheets of aluminum foil. Sprinkle the scallions, ginger, garlic and sesame oil evenly over the bass. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Place a cilantro sprig over each fillet and loosely wrap up the foil, making 2 packages. Bake for 7 minutes. Carefully unwrap the foil and divide the bass among 4 plates. Serve immediately.
